jobDescription: Young Interventions, Inc. is hiring for a Bilingual Spanish Speaking Early Intervention Specialist Mentor - Field Supervisor, in Santa Clara County San Jose & surrounding areas. If you are interested in being part of an organization whose mission is a commitment to improving the quality of life for infants and toddlers with or at risk of developing developmental disabilities, then Young Interventions is for you. We are looking for qualified, motivated, energetic and creative professionals, to work with children in the family homes to help implement personalized family focused treatment programs. Young Interventions, Inc. Programs focus on a Parent Coaching Model to guide the family in helping their child reach their developmental milestones.  Field Supervisors provide Early Intervention services for developmentally delayed infants & toddlers during home visits, provide developmental assessments, develop reports based on standardized assessment results, create routines based goals and curriculum planning, as well as supervise a small staff of Early Intervention Specialists. This position is a full-time salaried position with benefits offered. This position will require you to drive to various home sites within Santa Clara County. These areas may include San Jose, Milpitas, Santa Clara, Mountain View, Sunnyvale, Gilroy, Morgan Hill, Hollister and surrounding areas.
